      • add

        public static void add(java.lang.String courseId,
       java.lang.String sectionId,
       int day,
       java.util.Date start,
       java.util.Date end,
       java.lang.String instructor,
       java.lang.String venue,
       int size)
        Add new Section to database
        Parameters:
        course - Course Code
        section - Each course has multiple sections (S1,S2 etc). The section number is a number less than 100.
        day - The day of week
        start - The start time of the class
        end - The end time of the class
        instructor - The instructor of the class
        venue - The venue where the class is going to be conducted
        size - The class size

      • update

        Update the specific row of data from database
        Parameters:
        course - Course Code
        section - Each course has multiple sections (S1,S2 etc). The section number is a number less than 100.
        day - The day of week
        start - The start time of the class
        end - The end time of the class
        instructor - The instructor of the class
        venue - The venue where the class is going to be conducted
        size - The class size
